title: Register Webhook
description: Register to receive updates via webhook

api_key_value.description: The value that the HTTP header 'api_key_name' will be set to

status.description: Status of the Webhook. `created` will register the webhook in the created state and the service instance will attempt to start sending events. `disabled` will register the webhook in a disabled state and will not send events. Assumed to be `created` if not set.
